page.title: 03N.CAVE CHURCH FUND RAISING
page.content:
Hello! I am a reporter for the local paper and I am writing an article on All Saints' Church, North Cave. I am finding out about the fund-raising events and what they were for.
In l978 there was a country festival lasting a weekend to raise money to renew the lead on the church roof. In l980 money was collected around the village at coffee mornings, garden fetes and sales of work,etc. The church was repainted, rewired and was treated for woodworm. In l985 there was a marquee dinner which produced Â£2000 towards repainting the church clock and other expenses. Money has been given in the village for heating and new lights too. Whenever the church has needed financial aid it has always been found
